text: Allah ni Ajula juwanyakwile mawunde mwangali misati jankujiona; kaneka ni jwatenjele pa Arishi (Chindanda Chaulungu). Ni alijepepesye lyuwa ni mwesi, chilichose (mwa yalakweyi) chikwenda (mwakwendelechela) mpaka pandema jekolanjidwe. Jwalakwe jukulondesyaga ichindu (ya iwumbe Yakwe). Jugopolanya ma Aya kuti jenumanja nkulupilile kusyesyene yakusimangana ni Mâ€™mbuje gwenu
